wikipedia_page.main: Peter Patrick Phoenix (31 December 1936 – 14 April 2020) was an English footballer who played as a left winger in the Football League.Phoenix began his playing career with Tamworth, before being spotted by Oldham Athletic, where he made his Football League debut in February 1958.

link_mentions.page: List of Oldham Athletic A.F.C. seasons

response: * 16 April 2020:  Peter Phoenix, 83, Oldham Athletic, Rochdale, Exeter City, Southport and Stockport County winger.
